sentences: Teie arvamus on mulle väga oluline.
context: The Estonian word 'teil' is the adessive case form of the pronoun 'teie', which means 'you' in a formal or plural context. It translates to English as 'with you' or indicates possession similar to 'your'. This form is used when something is located with or possessed by the person(s) being addressed formally or when speaking to multiple people.
